added_paradox.name: Extraction Hero Paradox
added_paradox.summary: An economy that dismantles autonomy, sells necessity back at profit, and then praises individual endurance as proof the system works.
added_paradox.example_quote: We privatized clean air, raised the rent on sunlight, and you still managed to feed seven people‚Äîsee, capitalism creates opportunity!
added_paradox.detected_pattern: Systemic deprivation reframed as personal triumph; survival celebrated as virtue signaling for exploitation.

humor_recalibration_prompts: Ask who benefits when resilience is mandatory.
Translate the motivational poster into a utility bill.
If survival itself is a metric of excellence, check the system for predation.
